mapper.insert: insert into TB_TAOYINGYI( TAONAME, TAOAGE, TAOTEL, TAOEMAIL, TAOASSOCIATION, TAOTEXAS, TAOYINGYI_ID ) values ( #{TAONAME}, #{TAOAGE}, #{TAOTEL}, #{TAOEMAIL}, #{TAOASSOCIATION}, #{TAOTEXAS}, #{TAOYINGYI_ID} )
mapper.select:
INSERT INTO TB_TAOYINGYI( TAONAME, TAOAGE, TAOTEL, TAOEMAIL, TAOASSOCIATION, TAOTEXAS, TAOYINGYI_ID ) VALUES
(#{itm.TAONAME},#{itm.TAOAGE},#{itm.TAOEMAIL},#{itm.TAOASSOCIATION},#{itm.TAOTEXAS},#{itm.TAOYINGYI_ID})

mapper.select: select TAONAME, TAOAGE, TAOTEL, TAOEMAIL, TAOASSOCIATION, TAOTEXAS, TAOYINGYI_ID from TB_TAOYINGYI where TAOYINGYI_ID = #{TAOYINGYI_ID}
select a.TAONAME, a.TAOAGE, a.TAOTEL, a.TAOEMAIL, a.TAOASSOCIATION, a.TAOTEXAS, a.TAOYINGYI_ID from TB_TAOYINGYI a

mapper.delete:
